duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive business to business sales activities.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, maintaining simultaneous engagement with multiple prospects.
Engage in face-to-face networking and client acquisition, leveraging persuasive communication and problem-solving skills.
Maintain client relationships, ensuring future revenue growth and renewal.
Participate in sales training programs and embrace high standards for performance and sales leadership.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
